description: While pisco is a Latin American liquor, the Pisco Sour is an American cocktail credited to Victor Morris, an expat bartender who made this cocktail in Lima in the 1920s. Since then, the cocktail has gained popularity that it became a staple not only in South America but also in other parts of the world where the Hispanic and Latin American culture is strong. This drink is also popular to other cultures, especially after it was served during the 2008 APEC summit in Peru.
name: Pisco Sour
